channel.title: Posts on Zombdata
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Zombdata

item.title: Active communities of zombie-lovers: Where are you?
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set( message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, include = FALSE ) The aim of this post if to provide a first glimpse into what Zombdata looks like. We will focus on describing the spatial location of the main sources of zombie-related material. The analysis here presented are updated every day! Where are the creators?

item.title: Zombdata is coming to town
item.description: Hi! In this first post I will tell you a bit about this project, and what to expect from it in the short and mid term. I love zombie-related material as much as I love making lists^[At 8 years I made a list of all cars I had seen, classified by brand, country, and year. I didn't even like cars]. Some time ago I started making a list of all zombie films I'd like to watch.
